lead_paragraph: European regulators have started a review into the safety of Gilead Sciences’ leukemia drug Zydelig over concerns about serious adverse events, including deaths.

headline.print_headline: Europe Investigates Safety of Gilead Leukemia Drug
headline.main: Europe Investigates Safety of Gilead Leukemia Drug

snippet: European regulators have started a review into the safety of Gilead Sciences’ leukemia drug Zydelig over concerns about serious adverse events, including deaths.
abstract: European regulators announce start of safety review of Gilead Sciences’ leukemia drug Zydelig following rise in number of harmful events reports, including deaths, during three clinical trials.
